Description of incident: Personal information from 455              students at Calhoun Area Career Center during the 2005-2006 school              year was available online for more than three years. The information              included names, Social Security numbers, 2006 addresses and telephone              numbers, birth dates and school information. There were about 1,000              students at the career center during that time, but an investigation              by the Calhoun County Intermediate School district found that information              for 455 students was available.
